item.description:
Free admission! Free parking! Free speaker series! Free samples!
Inspiring presentations! Exhibitors! Kids Zone! Restaurants! FUN, FUN, FUN! WorcesterVegFest.com

Doors open to the public at 11am. All ages welcome. Parking is free, but please consider carpooling. Admission is free. The event will feature many free food samples - However, we highly recommend bringing cash for the vegan restaurants and bakeries, as well as all the great exhibitors that will feature vegan products such as books and clothing. We encourage you to donate to support our work at VegWorcester and the many animal welfare organizations representing!

11:30am-12:15pm - Cooking demo: ANNIE & DAN SHANNON, Bloggers and Authors of “Betty Goes Vegan” Cookbook.
12:15pm-12:30pm - Book signing: Betty Goes Vegan

1pm-2pm - Presentation: PAUL SHAPIRO, VP of Farm Animal Protection for the Humane Society of the United States, and Founder of Compassion Over Killing.

2:30pm-3:15pm - Cooking demo: TERRY HOPE ROMERO, Author of several popular vegan cookbooks including "Vegan Eats World", "Veganomicon", "Viva Vegan", and “Vegan Cupcakes Take Over The World.”
3:15pm-3:30pm - Book signing: Vegan Eats World

3:30pm-4:15pm - Presentation: RICH ROLL, Ultra-Endurance Vegan Athlete and plant-based nutrition wellness advocate.
4:15-4:30pm - Book signing: Finding Ultra


http://WorcesterVegFest.com
item.name: Worcester Veg Fest
